column1: * 1879 - Author James Branch Cabell is born.
* 1924 - Voice actor Philip Stone is born.
* 1946 - The review "Sunday Times (14 April 1946)" by J.R.R. Tolkien is published.
* 1954 - Comics writer Charles Dixon is born.
** Eorl and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.Category:Datesfi:14. huhtikuuta
